item.description:
The Great American Grill
303 Main St
No. Reading MA

On the first Friday we had Laurel's Rest in Boston. A place where us ladies would all meet, have a few drinks and a great meal. It was a great social event for us.

NOW it's back bigger and better at The Great American Tavern in North Reading.

We have our own restaurant with fine dining and entertainment.

Come celebrate our first event "Strictly GIRLLLLS" at this location on FEB 18, 2011.

** RESERVATIONS for DINNER ((Make sure you mention BLUSH EVENT)) are being taking by calling 978 207 1240 **

A great place to meet some fabulous women.

We have an all female sexy staff that will cater to us.

• FREE Parking
• DJ JODI
• Top Shelf Alcohol
• Sexy Female Staff
• Fine Dining
• PIANO Bar
• and more to come……………..
item.name: Just Like Laurel's But Better
